# Game Assets Checklist

## üìÅ Sprites (`/public/sprites/`)
*Format: PNG is recommended. Keep pixel art consistent (e.g., 32x32 or 64x64).*

- [ ] `vu_idle.png` - Main character standing still.
- [ ] `vu_run.png` - Main character running (can be a spritesheet).

- [ ] `projectile_egg.png` - An egg (or rotten egg).

### ‚ú® Level 3: TWAN HQ (Starry)
- [ ] `demon_statue.png` - Statue of the "Demon King".

### üé≠ Level 5: The Boss (Penthouse)

## üîä Sounds (`/public/sounds/`)
*Format: MP3 or WAV.*

### üéµ Music (BGM)
- [ ] `bgm_stealth.mp3` - Quiet, sneaky music (Level 1).
- [ ] `bgm_chase.mp3` - Fast-paced, chaotic music (Level 2 & 4).
- [ ] `bgm_boss.mp3` - Epic dramatic music (Level 5).
- [ ] `bgm_emotional.mp3` - Piano/Soft music (Ending).

### üîä Sound Effects (SFX)
- [ ] `sfx_alert.mp3` - Spotted by guard.
- [ ] `sfx_hit.mp3` - Player taking damage.
- [ ] `sfx_shoot.mp3` - Projectile fired.
- [ ] `sfx_clank.mp3` - Mask inserting into gate.
- [ ] `sfx_win.mp3` - Level complete / Elevator open.
